GSP33brssgo2u:14: utpannasya jagato niyantṛtvena stithikāraṇaṃ, māyāvīva māyāyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:15: prasāritasya ca jagataḥ punaḥ svātmanyevopasaṃhārakāraṇaṃ, avaniriva caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya
GSP33brssgo2u:16: sa eva ca sarveṣāṃ na ātmetyetadvedāntavākyasamanvayapratipādanena pratipāditam /
GSP33brssgo2u:18: idānīṃ svapakṣe smṛtinyāyavirodhaparihāraḥ, pradhānādivādānāṃ ca nyāyābhāsopabṛṃhitatvaṃ, prativedāntaṃ ca sṛṣṭyādiprakriyāyā
GSP33brssgo2u:22: yaduktaṃ brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti, tadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:24: smṛtiśca tantrākhyā paramarṣipraṇītā śiṣṭaparigṛhītā anyāśca tadanusīriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ, evaṃ satyanavākāśāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:25: tāsu hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svatantraṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamupanibadhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:34: kathaṃ punarīkṣatyādibhyo hetubhyo brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamityavadhāritaḥ śrutyarthaḥ smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgena punarākṣipyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:36: paratantraprajñāstu prāyeṇa janāḥ svātantryeṇa śrutyarthamavadhārayitumaśaknuvantaḥ prakhyātapraṇetṛkāsu smṛtiṣvavalamberan /
GSP33brssgo2u:38: asmatkṛte ca vyākhyāne na viśvasyurbahumānātsmṛtīnāṃ praṇetṛṣu /
GSP33brssgo2u:40: śrutiśca bhavati- 'ṛṣiṃ prasūtaṃ kapilaṃ yastamagre jñānairbibharti jāyamānaṃ ca paśyet' (śve. 5.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:43: tasmādapi smṛtibalena vedāntā vyākhyeyā iti punarākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:45: yadi smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgeneśvarakāraṇavāda ākṣipyeta, evamapyanyā īśvarakāraṇavādinyaḥ smṛtayo 'navakāśāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:46: tā udāhariṣyāmaḥ - 'yattatsūkṣmamavijñeyam' iti paraṃ brahma prakṛtya 'sa
GSP33brssgo2u:47: hyantarātmā bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaśceti kathyate' iti coktvā 'tasmādavyaktamutpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattama' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo2u:50: sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṃ saṃhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ' iti purāṇe /
GSP33brssgo2u:51: bhagavadgītāsu ca- 'ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayastathā'
GSP33brssgo2u:53: paramātmānameva ca prakṛtyāpastamabaḥ paṭhati- 'tasmātkāyāḥ prabhavanti sarve sa mūlaṃ śāśvatikaḥ sa nityaḥ (dha.sū. 1.8.23.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:62: nacātīndriyānarthañśrutimantareṇa kaścidupalabhata iti śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ nimittābhāvāt
GSP33brssgo2u:68: tataśca pūrvasiddhāyāścodanāyā artho na paścimasiddhapuruṣavacanavaśenātiśaṅkituṃ śakyate
GSP33brssgo2u:69: siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapi bahutvātsiddhānāṃ pradraśitena prakāreṇa smṛtivipratipattau satyāṃ na śrutivyapāśrayādanyannirṇayakāraṇamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:72: tasmāttasyāpi smṛtivipratipattyupanyāsena smṛtyanusārāviṣayavivecanena ca sanmārge prajñā saṃgrahaṇīyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:73: yā tu śrutiḥ kapilasya jñānātiśayaṃ pradarśayantī pradarśitā na tayā śrutiviruddhamapi kāpilaṃ mataṃ śraddhātuṃ śakyaṃ, kāpilamiti śrutisāmānyamātratvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:74: anyasya ca kapilasya sagaraputrāṇāṃ pratapturvāsudevanāmnaḥ smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:76: bhavati cānyā manormāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayantī śrutiḥ - 'yadvai kiñca
GSP33brssgo2u:80: ' (12.11) iti sarvātmatvadarśanaṃ praśaṃsatā kāpilaṃ mataṃ nindyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:82_0: mahābhārate 'pi ca 'bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmannutāho eka eva tu' iti vicārya 'bahavaḥ puruṣā rājansāṃkhyayogavicāriṇām' iti parapakṣamupanyasya
GSP33brssgo2u:84: ' ityupakramya 'mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃsthitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:90: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (ī. 7) ityevaṃvidhā /
GSP33brssgo2u:91: ataśca siddhamātmabhedakalpanayāpi kapilasya tantraṃ vedaviruddhaṃ vedānusārimanuvacanaviruddhaṃ ca, na kevalaṃ svatantraprakṛtikalpanayaiveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:92: vedasya hi nirapekṣaṃ svārthe prāmāṇyaṃ raveriva rūpaviṣaye /
GSP33brssgo2u:93: puruṣavacasāṃ tu mūlāntarāpekṣaṃ vaktusmṛtivyavahitaṃ ceti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:109_0: 'nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi'iti śruternāmatanukṛdapi saṃjñāmūrtivyākartāpi liṅgaśarīropādhinā karteti aṃśa iti ca prathitaḥ prasiddho
GSP33brssgo2u:109_1: yastaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ paramātmānaṃ mūlaprakṛtiniyantāraṃ bhaje ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:115: evaṃ prathamādhyāyasyārthamanūdya tasmin viṣaye virodhaparihāraviṣayiṇaṃ dvitīyādhyāyasyārthaṃ pādaśaḥ saṃkṣipya kathayati-idānīmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:118: tṛtīyapāde prativedāntaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ jīvātmaśrutīnāṃ ca vyomādimahābhūtānāṃ janmalayakramādikathanenāvirodhaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:128: atra pūrvapakṣe smṛtivirodhāduktasamanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:130: sa kiṃ sāṃkhyasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti smṛtiprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-yaduktamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:131: tantryante vyutpādyante tattvānyaneneti tantraṃ śāstraṃ kapiloktam,
GSP33brssgo2u:132: anyāśca pañcaśikhādibhiḥ proktāḥ, evaṃ sati vedāntānāmadvayabrahmasamanvaye nirarthakāḥ syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:134: nanu sāṃkhyasmṛtiprāmāṇyāya pradhānavādagrahe manvādismṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syādityāśaṅkya tāsāṃ dharme sāvakāśatvātpramāṇyaṃ syādityāha-manvādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:135: tarhi sāṃkhyādismṛtīnāmapi dharme tātparyeṇa prāmāṇyamastu, tattvaṃ tu brahmaivetyavirodha ityata āha-naivamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:138: śrutivirodhe smṛtyaprāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvātpūrvapakṣo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:139: ye svātantryeṇa śrutyarthaṃ jñātuṃ śaknuvanti teṣāmayaṃ pūrvapakṣo na bhavet, sāṃkhyavṛddheṣu śraddhālūnāṃ tu bhavedityāha-bhavediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:145: yathā sāṃkhyasmṛtivirodhādbrahmavādastyājya iti tvayocyate tathā smṛtyantaravirodhātpradhānavādāstyājya iti mayocyata iti
GSP33brssgo2u:156: nanu śrutivirodhaḥ kimiti nokta ityata āha-smṛtibaleneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:157: smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe kathaṃ tattvanirṇayaḥ, tatrāha-darśitaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:160: vastutattve smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe vastuni vikalpāyogāt kḷptaśrutimūlāḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ, itarāstu kalpyaśrutimūlā na pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:164: veṣṭayitavyā'iti smṛtirmānaṃ na veti saṃdehe, mūlaśrutyanumānānmānamiti prāpte siddhāntaḥ-kḷptaśrutivirodhe
GSP33brssgo2u:166: hi yato 'sati virodhe śrutyanumānaṃ bhavati, atra tu virodhe sati śrutyanumānāyogānmūlābhāvāt sarvaveṣṭanasmṛtirapramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:170: kapilādibhiḥ kilādau vedaprāmāṇyaṃ niścitya tadarthasya dharmasyānuṣṭhānena siddhiḥ saṃpāditā, tayā siddhyā praṇītasmṛtyanusāreṇānādiśrutipīḍā na yuktopajīvyavirodhāditi
GSP33brssgo2u:174: śrutīnāṃ mukhyārthamatikramyopacaritārthatvaṃ śaṅkituṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:178: siddhānāṃ vacanamāśritya vedārthakalpanāyāmapi siddhoktīnāṃ mitho virodhe śrutyāśritamanvādyuktibhireva vedārthanirṇayo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:180: nanu mandamateḥ sāṃkhyasmṛtau śraddhā bhavati tasya matirvedāntamārge kathamāneyetyata āha-paratantretyādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:181: nanu śrutyā kapilasya sarvajñatvoktestanmate śraddhā durvāretyata āha-yā
GSP33brssgo2u:183: kapilaśabdamātreṇa sāṃkhyakartā śrauta iti bhrāntirayuktā, tasya dvaitavādinaḥ sarvajñatvāyogāt
GSP33brssgo2u:184: atra ca sarvajñānasaṃbhṛtatvena śrutaḥ kapilo vāsudevāṃśa eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:185: sa hi sarvātmatvajñānaṃ vaidikaṃ sāṃkhyamupadiśatīti sarvajña iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:187: kiñca yaḥ kapilaṃ jñānairbibharti tamīśvaraṃ paśyediti vidhīyate, tathā cānyārthasya īśvarapratipattiśeṣasya kapilasarvajñatvasya darśanamanuvādastasya mānāntareṇa prāptiśūnyasya
GSP33brssgo2u:189: dvaitavādinaḥ kapilasya śrautatvaṃ nirasya brahmavādino manoḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:193: puruṣā ātmānaḥ kiṃ vastuto bhinnā uta sarvadṛśyānāṃ pratyagātmaḥ eka iti vimarśārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:194: bahūnāṃ puruṣākārāṇāṃ dehānāṃ yathaikā yonirupādānaṃ pṛthvī tathā taṃ puruṣamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ sarvopādānatvena sarvātmakaṃ sarvajñātvādiguṇaiḥ saṃpannaṃ kathayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:206: yasmiñjñānakāle kevalaṃ svatantraprakṛtikalpanayaiva vedaviruddhaṃ na kintvātmabhedakalpanayāpīti siddhamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:207: smṛtivirodhe vedasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vedasya hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:209: pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ svārthasmṛtitanmūlānubhavayoḥ kalpanayā pramāṇyaṃ jñeyamiti vyavahitaṃ parataḥprāmāṇyamiti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:212: iha svataḥparataḥpramāṇyayorvaiṣamyājjhaṭiti niścitaprāmāṇyena cānupasaṃjātavirodhinā vedavākyena viruddhasmṛtereva bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:220: pradhānāditarāṇi yāni pradhānapariṇāmatvaṃ na samṛtau kalpitāni mahadādīni na tāni vede loke vopalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:223: yadapi kvacittatparamiva śravaṇamavabhāsate tadapyatatparaṃ vyākhyātam 'ānumānikamapyekeṣām' (bra. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo2u:227: mahadahaṅkārau tāvadaprasiddhau, ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha-itareṣāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:233: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha ityata āha-tarketi
GSP33brssgo2u:240: tatrāpi śrutivirodhena pradhānaṃ svatantrameva kāraṇaṃ, mahadādīni ca kāryāṇyalokavedaprasiddhāni kalpyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:243: samyagdarśanābhyupāyo hi yogo vede vihitaḥ 'śrotavyo mantavyo
GSP33brssgo2u:245: 'tryunnataṃ sthāpya samaṃ śarīram' (śve. 2.8) ityādinā cāsanādikalpanāpuraḥsaraṃ bahuprapañcaṃ yogavidhānaṃ śvetāśvataropaniṣadi dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:246_0: liṅgāni ca vaidikāni yogaviṣayāṇi sahasraśa upalabhyante 'tāṃ yogamiti manyante sthirāmindriyadhāraṇām' (kā. 2.6.18) iti
GSP33brssgo2u:247: yogaśāstre 'pi 'atha tattvadarśanopāyo yogaḥ' iti samyagdarśanābhyupāyatvenaiva yogoṅgīkriyate
GSP33brssgo2u:251: satīṣvapyadhyātmaviṣayāsu bahvīṣu smṛtiṣu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoreva nirākaraṇe yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:252: sāṃkhyayogau hi paramapuruṣārthasādhanatvena loke prakhyātau, śiṣṭaiśca
GSP33brssgo2u:256: nirākaraṇaṃ tu na sāṃkhyajñānena vedanirapekṣeṇa yogamārgeṇa vā niḥśreyasamadhigamyata iti
GSP33brssgo2u:259: dvaitino hi te sāṃkhyā yogāśca nātmaikatvadarśinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:260: yattu darśanamuktaṃ 'tatkāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhipannam' iti, vaidikameva tatra jñānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogaśabdābhyāmabhilapyate
GSP33brssgo2u:262: yena tvaṃśena na virudhyete teneṣṭameva sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoḥ sāvakāśatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:269: tattvajñānaṃ tu vedāntavākyebhya eva bhavati 'nāvedavinmanute taṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:275: brahmaṇyuktasamanvayaḥ pradhānavādiyogasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe
GSP33brssgo2u:282: na kevalaṃ yoge vidhiḥ kintu yogasya jñāpakānyarthavādavākyānyapi
GSP33brssgo2u:284: tāṃ pūrvoktāṃ dhāraṇāṃ yogavido yogaṃ paramaṃ tapa iti manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:285: uktāmetāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogividhiṃ dhyānaprakāraṃ ca mṛtyuprasādānnaciketā labdhā brahma prāpta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:290: evaṃ yogasmṛteryoge prāmāṇyāttattvāṃśe 'pi prāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣamanūdya siddhāntayati-iyamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:291: nanu bauddhādismṛtayo 'tra kimiti na nirākṛtā ityata āha-satīṣvapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:294: teṣāṃ prakṛtānāṃ kāmānāṃ kāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhyāṃ vivekadhyānābhyāmabhipannaṃ pratyaktayā prāptaṃ devaṃ jñātvā sarvapāśairavidyādibhirmucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:295: samūlatve smṛtidvayasya nirāsaḥ kimiti kṛta ityata āha-nirākaraṇaṃ tviti
GSP33brssgo2u:303: upakārakabādho na yukta ityāśaṅkya yoṃ'śa upakārakaḥ sa na bādhyaḥ kintu tattvāṃśa ityāha-tānyapīti
GSP33brssgo2u:310: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt |
GSP33brssgo2u:311: brahmāsya jagato nimittakāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasya pakṣasyākṣepaḥ smṛtinimittaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:314: nanu dharma iva brahmaṇyanapekṣa āgamo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:318: pariniṣpanne ca vastuni pramāṇāntarāṇāmastyavakāśo yathā pṛthivyādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo2u:319: yathāca śrutīnāṃ parasparavirodhe satyekavaśenetarā nīyante, evaṃ pramāṇāntaravirodhe 'pi tadvaśenaiva śrutirnīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:322: anubhavāvasānaṃ ca brahmavijñānamavidyāyā nivartakaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ ca dṛṣṭaphalatayeṣyate
GSP33brssgo2u:323: śrutirapi- 'śrotavyo mantavyaḥ' iti śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhatī tarkamapyatrādartavyaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:325: yaduktaṃ cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:329: idaṃ hi brahmakāryatvenābhipreyamāṇaṃ jagat brahmavilakṣaṇamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:330: brahma ca jagadvilakṣaṇaṃ cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ ca śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:332: nahi rucakādayo vikārā mṛtprakṛtikā bhavanti śarāvādayo vā suvarṇaprakṛtikāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:333: mṛdaiva tu mṛdānvitā vikārāḥ kriyante suvarṇena ca suvarṇānvitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:334: tathedamapi jagadacetanaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānvitaṃ sadacetanasyaiva sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasya kāraṇasya kāryaṃ bhavitumarhatīti na vilakṣaṇasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:343: yo hyekasya cetanasya parigraho buddhyādicetanabhāgaḥ sa evānyasya cetanasyopakaroti natu svayameva cetanaścetanāntarasyopakarotyapakaroti vā
GSP33brssgo2u:349: yo 'pi kaścidācakṣīta śrutvā jagataścetanaprakṛtikatāṃ tadbalenaiva samastaṃ jagaccetanamavagamayiṣyāmi
GSP33brssgo2u:352: yathā spaṣṭacaitanyānāmapyātmanāṃ svāpamūrcchādyavasthāsu caitanyaṃ na vibhāvyata evaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādīnāmapi caitanyaṃ na vibhāvayiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:353: etasmādeva ca vibhāvitāvibhāvitatvakṛtādviśeṣādrūpādibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ ca kāryakāraṇānāmātmanāṃ ca cetanatvāviśeṣe 'pi guṇapradhānabhāvo na virotsyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:354: yathā ca pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pi māṃsasūpaudanādīnāṃ pratyātmavartino viśeṣātparasparopakāritvaṃ bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:358: nacetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvaṃ parihartuṃ śakyata ityāha- tathātvaṃ ca śabdāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:359: anavagamyamānamevaṃ hīdaṃ loke samastasya vastunaścetanatvaṃ cetanaprakṛtikatvaśravaṇācchabdaśaraṇatayā kevalayotprekṣata, tacca śabdenaiva virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:362: śabda eva 'vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca' (te. 2.6) iti kasyacidvibhāgasyācetanatāṃ śrāvayaṃścetanādbrahmaṇo vilakṣaṇamacetanaṃ jagacchrāvayati // 4 //
GSP33brssgo2u:377: nanvekaviṣayatvena virodhe 'pi śrutivirodhānmānāntarameva bādhyatāmityata āha-yathā ceti /

GSP33brssgo2u:2212: yadyapīdaṃ vedāntavākyānāmaidaṃparyaṃ nirūpayituṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ na tarkśāstravat devalābhir yuktibhiḥ kaṃcit siddhāntaṃ sādhayituṃ dūṣayituṃ vā pravṛttam /

GSP33brssgo2u:2214: vedāntārthanirṇayasya ca samyagdarśanārthatvāt tannirṇayena svapakṣasthāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtaṃ taddyabhyarhitaṃ parapakṣapratyākhyānād iti /

GSP33brssgo2u:2217: tathāpi mahājanaparigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhyāditantrāṇi samyagdarśanāpadeśena pravṛttānyupalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcin mandamatīnām etāny api samyagdarśanāyopadeyānītyapekṣā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2218: tathā yuktagāḍhatvasaṃbhavena sarvajñabhāṣitatvācca śraddhā ca teṣvityatastadasāratopapādanāya prayatyate /

GSP33brssgo2u:2225: yattatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatttriguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ mṛdvadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvenaiva vicitreṇa vikārātmanā vivartata iti /

GSP33brssgo2u:2495: dhenvaiva hyupayuktaṃ tṛṇādi kṣīro bhavati na prahīṇamanaḍudādyupayuktaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2497: naca yathākāmaṃ mānuṣairna śakyaṃ saṃpādayitumityetāvatā nirnimittaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2499: manuṣyā api śaknuvatyevocitenopāyena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssgo2u:2500: prabhūtaṃ hi kṣīraṃ kāmayamānāḥ prabhūtaṃ ghāsaṃ dhenuṃ cārayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2504: punarapi dṛṣṭāntabalāt pradhānasya svata eva kādācitkapravṛttirityāśaṅkya niṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ-anyatretyādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:2515: athāpi nāma bhavataḥ śraddhāmanurudhyamānāḥ svābhāvikīmeva pradhānasya pravṛttimabhyupagacchema tathāpi doṣo 'nuṣajyetaiva /
GSP33brssgo2u:2518_0: yadi tāvatsvābhāvikī pradhānasya pravṛttirna kiñcidanyadihāpekṣata ityucyeta tato yathaiva sahakāri kiñcinnāpekṣata evaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2518_1: prayojanamapi kiñcinnāpekṣiṣyate ityataḥ pradhānaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ sādhayituṃ pravartata itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2519: sa yadi brūyātsahakāryeva kevalaṃ nāpekṣate na prayojanamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2520: tathāpi pradhānapravṛtteḥ prayojanaṃ vivektavyaṃ bhogo vā syādapavargo vobhayaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2546: autsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvadavyaktamiti kārikoktaṃ dūṣayati-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2547: autsukyamicchāviśeṣaḥ kevalajaḍasyātmano vā na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2548: asti puruṣasya dṛkśaktiścidrūpatvāt, asti ca pradhānasya
GSP33brssgo2u:2549: sargaśaktistriguṇatvāt, tayoḥ śaktyordṛśyasṛṣṭī vinā sārthakyāyogāt pradhānasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttiriti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2556: yathā kaścitpuruṣo dṛkśaktisaṃpannaḥ pravṛttiśaktihīnaḥ paṅguraparaṃ puruṣaṃ pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ dṛkśaktihīnamandhamadhiṣṭhāya pravartayati
GSP33brssgo2u:2558: evaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartayiṣyatīti dṛṣṭāntapratyayena punaḥ pratyavasthānam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2561: pradhānasya svatantrasya pravṛttyabhyupagamāt, puruṣasya na pravartakatvānabhyupagamāt
GSP33brssgo2u:2569: tathā pradhānasyācaitanyātpuruṣasya caudāsīnyāttṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayiturabhāvātsaṃbandhānupapattiḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2572_0: paramātmanastu svarūpavyapāśrayamaudāsīnyaṃ māyāvyapāśrayaṃ ca pravartakatvamityastyatiśayaḥ puruṣasya pravartakatvaṃ nirastamapi
GSP33brssgo2u:2573: pradhānasya svātantryaṃ puruṣasyaudāsīnyaṃ cābhyupetaṃ tyajyata iti vadantaṃ sāṃkhyaṃpratyāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2574: puruṣasya parispandaḥ prayatnaguṇo vā nāstīti vaktuṃ hetudvayam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2575: pradhānapuruṣayornityatvādvyāpitvācca nityaḥ saṃnidhiḥ, aśmanastu parimārjanamṛjutvena sthāpanamanityasaṃnidhiśceti
GSP33brssgo2u:2580: yathā svatantrapradhānapravṛttipakṣo bhogo 'pavarga ubhayaṃ vā phalamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:2581: vikalpya dūṣitaḥ, evaṃ puruṣādhīnapradhānapravṛttipakṣo 'pi phalābhāvena dūṣaṇīya ityāha-pūrvavacceti
GSP33brssgo2u:2595: aṅgāṅgibhāve sāmyasvarūpanāśaḥ syāt, tataḥ kauṭasthyabhaṅga iti
GSP33brssgo2u:2598: cirakālasthitasya sāmyasya cyutau nimittaṃ vācyaṃ tannāstītyarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo2u:2602: athāpi syādanyathā vayamanumimīmahe yathā nāyamanantaro doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2605: yathā yathā kāryotpāda upapadyate tathā tathaiṣāṃ svabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate
GSP33brssgo2u:2607: tasmātsāmyāvasthāyāmapi vaiṣamyopagamayogyā eva guṇā avatiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2608: evamapi pradhānasya jñaśaktiviyogādracanānupapattyādayaḥ pūrvoktā doṣāstadavasthā eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:2611: vaiṣamyopagamayogyā api guṇāḥ sāmyāvasthāyāṃ nimittābhāvānnaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:2612: bhajamānā vā nimittābhāvāviśeṣātsarvadaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeranniti prasajyata evāyamanantaro 'pi doṣaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2613: guṇānāṃ mitho 'napekṣasvabhāvatvānna svato vaiṣamyamityuktam, tatra hetvasiddhimāśaṅkya sūtrakāraḥ pariharati-anyatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2614: anapekṣasvabhāvādanyathā sāpekṣatvena guṇānāmanumānātpūrvasūtrokto doṣo na prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2627: prasiddha eva tu śrutyeśvarakāraṇavādinyā virodhastadanuvartinyā ca smṛtyā
GSP33brssgo2u:2630: ekaṃ hi brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇamabhyupagacchatāmekasyaivātmano viśeṣau tapyatāpakau na jātyantarabhūtāvityabhyupagantavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2631: yadi cetau tapyatāpakāvekasyātmano viśeṣau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ tapyatāpakābhyāṃ na nirmucyata iti tāpopaśāntaye samyagdarśanamupadiśacchāstramanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2632: nahyauṣṇyaprakāśadharmakasya pradīpasya tadavasthasyaiva tābhyāṃ nirmokṣa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2633: yo 'pijalataraṅgavīcīphenādyupanyāsaḥ, tatrāpi jalātmana ekasya vīcyādanyo viśeṣā āvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpeṇa nityā eveti samāno jalātmano vīcyādibhiranirmokṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2636: yadyarthinaḥ svato 'nyor'tho na syāt, yasyārthino yadviṣayamarthitvaṃ sa
GSP33brssgo2u:2637: tasyārtho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ syāt, yathā prakāśātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśākhyortho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2649: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2653: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo2u:2655: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:2658: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2659: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:2660: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2661: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2662: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2665: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2668: sattvānurodhitvāccetano 'pi tapyata iveti cet, paramārthatastarhi naiva tapyata ityāpatatīvaśabdaprayogāt
GSP33brssgo2u:2670: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2671: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2675: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta , nityatvābhyupagamācca tāpakasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:2676: tapyatāpakaśaktyornityatve 'pi sanimittasaṃyogāpekṣatvāpatteḥ saṃyoganimittādarśananivṛttāvātyantikaḥ saṃyogoparamaḥ, tataścātyantiko mokṣa upapanna iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2680: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne 'pi nopajāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2681: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2683: sarmendriyāṇi pañca, saptamaṃ ca mana iti saptendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2688: tvaṅmātrameva jñānendriyamekamanekaśabdādijñānakāraṇaṃ, pañca karmendriyāṇi manaśceti saptendriyāṇi, jñānendriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:2694: tasmādbhrāntimūlatvātsāṃkhyaśāstrasya tena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham
GSP33brssgo2u:2700: yathaikavahnyātmakayorauṣṇyaprakāśayoḥ, ato na vyavahāralopa ityāśaṅkya vahneriva tābhyāmātmanomokṣo na syādityāha-yadi cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2701: nanu satyapi dharmiṇi svabhāvanāśo mokṣa upapadyate, satyeva jale vīcyādināśadarśanādityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntāsiddhimāha-yo 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2703: artho hyarjanālābhādinārthinaṃ tāpayatīti tāpakaḥ, arthī tapyastayorabhede bādhakamāha-yadīti
GSP33brssgo2u:2707: arthatvaṃ hi kāmanāviṣayatvaṃ, tacca kāmyādanyasya kāmayiturasatvānna
GSP33brssgo2u:2709: na hi svasya svārthatvamasti kāmyasyaiva kāmayitṛtvāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2716: tayā tapyayā buddhyā puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ svasvāmibhāvastasya heturanādiravivekastasya parihāro vivekastasmānnityamuktasyāpi puruṣasya kathañcidupacārānmokṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2717: yathā yoddhṛgatau jayaparājayau rājanyupacaryete tathā puruṣādatyantabhinnabuddhigatau bandhamokṣau puruṣe upacaryete /
GSP33brssgo2u:2726: yatra tapyatāpakabhāvo dṛṣṭastatraiveti vyavahārapakṣamādāya siddhāntī brūte-kiṃna paśyasīti
GSP33brssgo2u:2728: acetanasyaiva dehasya taptirneti vadatā sāṃkhyena vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cetanasya kevalasya taptiḥ, kiṃvā dehasaṃhatasya, uta tapteḥ, āhosvit sattvasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:2735: tarhi jalacandrasya calanavanmithyaiva taptirityasmatpakṣa āgata ityāha-paramārthata iti /

GSP33brssgo2u:2740: saviṣayatvaṃ nirviṣayatvaṃ cevaśabdārthaḥ kalpita eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2741: sāṃkhyasyāvidyake tapyatāpakatve sati mamāpi kiñcinna duṣyati kintu dṛṣṭameva saṃpannamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2742: yadi mithyātapyatvāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ syāditi bhītyā satyaṃ tapyatvaṃ puruṣasyocyate tathāpyapasiddhāntaḥ, kauṭasthyahānāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2746: sattvaṃ puruṣo vā tapyaśaktiḥ, tāpakaśaktistu rajaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2747: nimittamavivekātmakadarśanaṃ tamastena sahitaḥ sanimittaḥ saṃyegaḥ puruṣasya guṇasvāmitvarūpastadapekṣatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2749: nimittasya nivṛttyabhāvānna mokṣa iti siddhāntī pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2755: vyavahārastu bhedāṅgīkārāttapyatāpakabhāvo bandhaḥ tattvajñānāttannivṛttiścopapadyata iti na codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo2u:2762: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2763_0: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante, śuklebhyastantubhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2763_1: śuklasya paṭasya prasavadarśanāttadviparyayādarśanācca tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi
GSP33brssgo2u:2764: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2767: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2768: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante
GSP33brssgo2u:2770: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2774: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam
GSP33brssgo2u:2775: aṇutvahrasvatve tu dvyaṇukasamavāyinī api naivārabhete, caturaṇukasya mahattvādīrghatvaparimāṇayogābhyupagamāt
GSP33brssgo2u:2776: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2777_0: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam, yathā
GSP33brssgo2u:2777_1: vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam, evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata
GSP33brssgo2u:2779_0: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:2779_1: natu cetanāvirodhinā guṇāntareṇa jagata ākrāntatvamasti, yena kāraṇagatā cetanā
GSP33brssgo2u:2784: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2787: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2792: pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyucyeta, dravyāntare guṇāntare vārabhyamāṇe sarveṣāmeva kāraṇaguṇānāṃ svāśrayasamavāyaviśeṣāt
GSP33brssgo2u:2799: naca dravyasya dravyamevodāhartavyaṃ guṇasya vā guṇa eveti kaścinniyame heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2803: yathā pratyakṣāpratyakṣayorbhūmyākāśayoḥ samavayansaṃyogo 'pratyakṣa evaṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu samavayaccharīramapratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2806: etaduktaṃ bhavati- guṇaśca saṃyogo dravyaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brssgo2u:2807: 'dṛśyate tu' (bra. sū. 2.1.6) iti cātrāpi vilakṣaṇotpattiḥ prapañcitā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2811: nanvatideśo 'pi samānanyāyatayā kṛtaḥ 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' (bra.sū. 2.1.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2813: tasyaiva tvayaṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyārambhe tatprakriyānugatena nidarśanena prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ // FN: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2817_0: yadyapi sāṃkhyamatanirāsānantaraṃ paramāṇuvādo nirākartavyaḥ svamatasthāpanasya smṛtipāde saṃgatatvāt tathāpi pūrvatra pradhānaguṇānāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2818: tathā brahmaguṇacaitanyānanvayādbrahmaṇo 'pi nopādānatvamiti doṣo dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatilābhādatra samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2820_0: sa kiṃ yaḥ samavāyikāraṇaguṇaḥ sa kāryadravye svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakastantuśauklyavaditi nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe
GSP33brssgo2u:2820_1: nyāyasyāvyabhicārādvirudhyata iti prāpte vyabhicārānna tadvirodha iti siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-eṣetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2821: yadyapi 'na vilakṣaṇatvāt'ityatra cetanādacetanasargaḥ sādhitastathāpi vaiśeṣikanyāyasya tadīyaprakriyayā vyabhicāroktyarthatvādasya sūtrasya na gatārthatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2822: pralayakāle paramāṇavo niścalā asaṃyuktāstiṣṭhanti sargakāle cādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogātteṣu karma bhavati, tena
GSP33brssgo2u:2825: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ, tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyamityucyate, tacca svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakaṃ na bhavatītyuktanyāyasya vyabhicāra iti
GSP33brssgo2u:2828: dve dve iti śabdadvayaṃ paṭhitavyam, evaṃ sati caturbhirdvyaṇukaiścaturaṇukārambha upapadyate, yathāśrute tu dvābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2829: dvyaṇukābhyāṃ mahataścaturaṇukasyārambho na yujyate, kāraṇagataṃ mahatvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā vinā kārye mahatvāyogāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2830_0: prakaṭārthakārāstu yaddvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāmārabdhaṃ kārye mahatvaṃ dṛśyate tasya hetuḥ pracayo nāma praśithilāvayavasaṃyoga
GSP33brssgo2u:2830_1: iti rāvaṇapraṇīte bhāṣye dṛśyata iti cirantanavaiśeṣikadṛṣṭyedaṃ bhāṣyamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2832: yadyapi tārkikā dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamiti kalpayanti tathāpi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhānānna niyama iti matvā brūte-yadāpi bahava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2833: kārakaguṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ samānajātīyaguṇārambhakāḥ, kāryadravyaparimāṇaṃ tu na kāraṇaparimāṇārabhyaṃ kintu kāraṇagatasaṃkhyārabhyamiti prakriyā tulyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2834: evaṃ prakriyāṃ darśayayitvā sūtraṃ yojayan vyabhicāramāha-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2837: aṇuhrasvebhyo dvyaṇukebhyo 'ṇudravyaṃ na jāyate hrasvamapi na jāyata iti
GSP33brssgo2u:2840: tathā ca hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvyaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuvaccetanādacetanaṃ jāyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2841: tatra hrasvānmahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukaṃ parimaṇḍalādaṇu dvyaṇukamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2846: utpannaṃ hi parimāṇāntaraṃ virodhi bhavati, tadutpatteḥ prāgvirodhyabhāvāt dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyārambhaḥ kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2847: nanu virodhiparimāṇena sahaiva dravyaṃ jāyata ityata āha-ārabdhamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2854: kāraṇānāṃ dvyaṇukānāṃ bahutvāt tryaṇuke mahatvaṃ mṛdo mahatvāt ghaṭe mahatvaṃ, dvitūlapiṇḍārabdhe
GSP33brssgo2u:2864: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha-tasmāditi
GSP33brssgo2u:2865: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2866: sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteścaitanyasya viśeṣaguṇatvādārambhakatvaṃ durvāramiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2870_0: nanu cetanaṃ brahma kāryopādānatvāddravyaṃ, tanna vilakṣaṇasyopādānamiti prakṛte kiñciddravyameva vilakṣaṇakāryakaramudāhartavyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2870_1: na saṃyogasya guṇasyodāharaṇamiti śaṅkate-dravya iti guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2885: sa ca vāda itthaṃ samuttiṣṭhata- paṭādīni hi loke sāvayavāni dravyāṇi svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistantvādibhirdravyairārabhyamāṇāni dṛṣṭāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:2886: tatsāmānyena yāvatkiñcitsāvayavaṃ tatsarvaṃ svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistairdravyairārabdhamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2890: nacākāraṇena kāryeṇa bhavitavyamityataḥ paramāṇavo jagataḥ kāraṇamiti kaṇabhugabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2891_0: tānīmāni catvāri bhūtāni bhūmyudakatejaḥpavanākhyāni sāvayavānyupalabhya caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ parikalpyante teṣāṃ cāpakarṣaparyantagatatvena
GSP33brssgo2u:2891_1: parato vibhāgāsaṃbhavādvanaśyatāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇuparyanto vibhāgo bhavati sa pralayakālaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2892: tataḥ sargakāle ca vāyavīyeṣvaṇuṣvadṛṣṭāpekṣaṃ karmotpadyate tatkarma svāśrayamaṇumaṇvantareṇa saṃniyukti tato dvyaṇukādikrameṇa vāyurutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2896: aṇugatebhyaśca rūpādibhyo dvyaṇukādigatāni rūpādīni saṃbhavanti tantupaṭanyāyeneti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2901: abhyupagame 'pi yadi prayatno 'bhighātādirvā (athā)yathādṛṣṭaṃ kimapi karmaṇo nimittamabhyupagamyeta tasyāsaṃbhavānnaivāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2903: śarīrapratiṣṭhe hi manasyātmanaḥ saṃyoge satyātmaguṇaḥ prayatno jāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2905: sargottarakālaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ nādyasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2906: athādṛṣṭamādyasya karmaṇo nimittamityucyeta tatpunarātmasamavāyi vā syādaṇusamavāyi vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2908: nahyacetanaṃ cetanenānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ pravartate pravartayati veti sāṃkhyaprakriyāyāmabhihitam
GSP33brssgo2u:2915: saṃyogābhāvācca tannibandhanaṃ dvyaṇukādi kāryajātaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2918: pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2921: kalpitānāmavastutvādavastveva saṃyoga iti vastunaḥ kāryasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2923: yathācādisarge nimittābhāvātsaṃyogotpattyarthaṃ karma nāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavatyevaṃ mahāpralaye 'pi vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ karma naivāṇūnāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2926: adṛṣṭamapi bhogaprasiddhyarthaṃ na pralayaprasiddhyarthamityato nimittābhāvānna syādaṇūnāṃ saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ vā karma /
GSP33brssgo2u:2932_0: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve 'pi paramāṇūnāṃ tadadhiṣṭhitānāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2936: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2937: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2943: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2954: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam
GSP33brssgo2u:2956: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ, karmaṇaśca nimittaṃ prayatnādikaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā
GSP33brssgo2u:2958: hastanodanādiṣvādigamanaṃ, tadvadaṇukarmaṇo dṛṣṭaṃ nimittamabhyupagamyate na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2959: dvitīye karmānutpattiḥ nādyaḥ, prayatnādeḥ sṛṣṭyuttarakālīnatvādityubhayathāpi na karma saṃbhavati
GSP33brssgo2u:2966: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam
GSP33brssgo2u:2974: vibhusaṃyogasyāṇuṣu sadā sattvāt kriyāsātatye pralayābhāvaḥ syāditi
GSP33brssgo2u:2978: yajjñānaṃ taccharīrajanyamiti vyāptivirodhena nityajñānāsiddhestadguṇa īśvaro nāsti, astitve 'pi sadā sattvānna niyāmakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2981: saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitve ekasminnitarasyāntarbhāvātkāryasya pṛthutvāyogāt sarvaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇumātraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2982: kiñca sāṃśadravye saṃyogasyaikāṃśavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvirodhādvyāpyavṛttitvaṃ na kalpyamityāha-dṛṣṭeti
GSP33brssgo2u:2985: notpadyeta, utpannaṃ vā mithyā syādityapasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2986: kāṇādānāṃ sargapratyuktau sūtraṃ yojayitvā pralayanirāse 'pi sūtraṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2988: paramāṇūnāṃ karmaṇā saṃyogātsargaḥ, vibhāgātpralaya iti prakriyā na
GSP33brssgo2u:2990: nimittasyāsattvāt dharmādharmarūpādṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhārthatvena sukhaduḥkaśūnyapralayaprayojakatvāyogānnādṛṣṭanimittena karmaṇā vibhāgaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2991_0: tathā ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭanimittayorasattvādubhayathāpi saṃyogārthatvena vibhāgārthatvena ca karma nāsti, ataḥ karmābhāvāttayoḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2991_1: saṃyogavibhāgapūrvakayoḥ sargapralayayorabhāva iti sūtrayojanā END BsCom_2,2.3.12
GSP33brssgo2u:2999: yathaiva hyaṇubhyāmatyantabhinnaṃ sadvyaṇukaṃ samavāyalakṣaṇena saṃbandhena tābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata evaṃ samavāyo 'pi samavāyibhyo
GSP33brssgo2u:3002: tataśca tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthaiva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3003: nanviha pratyayagrāhyaḥ samavāyo nityasaṃbaddha eva samavāyibhirgṛhyate nāsaṃbaddhaḥ saṃbandhāntarāpekṣo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3004: tataśca na tasyānyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyo yenānavasthā prasajyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3006: saṃyogo 'pyevaṃ sati saṃyogibhirnityasaṃbaddha eveti samavāyavannānyaṃ saṃbandhamapekṣeta
GSP33brssgo2u:3017: aṇuvādāsaṃbhava iti yogyatayā saṃbadhyate dvyaṇukasamavāyayoḥ paramāṇubhinnatvasāmyāt dvyaṇukavatsamavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramityanavasthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3018: nanviha tantuṣu paṭa ityādiviśiṣṭadhīniyāmakaḥ samavāyo na
GSP33brssgo2u:3020: saṃyogasyāpi svarūpasaṃbandhopapatteḥ samavāyo na syāditi dūṣayati-neti
GSP33brssgo2u:3026: tasmāt saṃbandhibhinnatvameva saṃbandhāntarāpekṣāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ, tasya samavāye 'pi tulyatvādanavasthā durvārā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3032: apicāṇavaḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā vā nivṛttisvabhāvā vobhayasvabhāvā vānubhayasvabhāvā vābhyupagamyante gatyantarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3041: anubhavasvabhāvatve naimittikī pravṛttirvācyā, nimittaṃ ca kālādṛṣṭādikaṃ nityasaṃnihitamiti nityameva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3046_0: sāvayavānāṃ dravyāṇāmavayavavaśo vibhajyamānānāṃ yataḥ paro vibhāgo na saṃbhavati te caturvidhā rūpādimantaḥ paramāṇavaścaturvidhasya
GSP33brssgo2u:3046_1: rūpādimato bhūtabhautikasyārambhakā nityāśceti yadvaiśeṣikā abhyupagacchanti sa teṣāmabhyupagamo nirālambana eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3051: yadi loke rūpādimadvastu tatsvakāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3052_0: tadyathā paṭastantūnapekṣya sthūle 'nityaśca bhavati tantavaścaṃśūnapekṣya sthūlā anityāśca bhavanti, tathācāmī paramāṇavo
GSP33brssgo2u:3052_1: rūpādimantastairabhyupagamyante, tasmātte 'pi kāraṇavantastadapekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca prāpnuvanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3053: yacca nityatve kāraṇaṃ tairuktam- 'sadakāraṇavannityam' (vai. sū. 4.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3057: yadapi nityatve dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'anityamiti ca viśeṣataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ' (vai. sū. 4.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3059: asati hi yasminkasmiṃścinnitye vastuni nityaśabdena nañaḥ samāso nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3064: yadapi nityatve tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'avidyā ca' (vai. sū. 4.1.5) iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3065: tadyadyevaṃ vivrīyate satāṃ paridṛśyamānakāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇamavidyeti, tato dvyaṇukanityatāpyāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3067: tasya ca prāgevoktatvāt 'avidyā ca' iti punaruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3070: nāvaśyaṃ vinaśyadvastu dvābhyāmeva hetubhyāṃ vinaṣṭumarhatiti niyamo 'sti
GSP33brssgo2u:3073: yadā tvapāstaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānamārambhakamabhyupagamyate tadā ghṛtakāṭhinyavilayanavanmūrtyavasthāvilayanenāpi vināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3076: kiṃ ca paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇavantaḥ kāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3077: rūpavattvāt rasavattvādgandhavattvāt sparśavattvāt ghaṭavaditi sūtraṃ yojayituṃ paraprakriyāmāha-sāvayavānāmityādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:3078: nanvatra paramāṇutvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ tadviruddhaṃ sthūlatvaṃ kathaṃ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3082: naca tarhi vāyuḥ kāraṇavāniti pṛthaksādhane rūpādihetūnāṃ bhāgāsiddhyabhāve 'pi siddhasādhanatā syāditi vācyaṃ, yatra
GSP33brssgo2u:3083: sparśastatkāraṇaṃ, yatra rūpaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti vyāptigrahakāle vāyutvādyavacchedena sādhyasiddhyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3085: ātmavaditi satpratipakṣamutthāpya viśeṣyāsiddhyā dūṣayati-yacca nityatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3087: nityatvapratiṣedhaḥ sapratiyogikaḥ, abhāvatvāt, ghaṭābhāvāvaditi nityasya kvacitsiddhau kāryamanityamiti viśeṣataḥ kārye
GSP33brssgo2u:3088: nityatvapratiṣedhāt kāraṇabhūtaparamāṇuṣu nityatvaṃ sidhyati, anyathā pratiyogyabhāve pratiṣedhānupapatteriti
GSP33brssgo2u:3091: vastutastu viśeṣavyavahāra evāsiddhaḥ, kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3092: yadi pramāṇāntaraṃ kāraṇanityatve syāttadāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samūlo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3093: tato mūlajñānātprāgvyavahāramātrānna vastusiddhiḥ, vaṭe yakṣavyavahārādapi tatsiddhiprasaṅgāt mūlajñāne tu tenaiva
GSP33brssgo2u:3095: evaṃ paramāṇunityatve kāṇādasūtradvayaṃ nirasya tṛtīyaṃ nirasyati-yadapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3096: satāmaṇūnāṃ dṛśyamānasathūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇajñānamavidyeti yadi sūtrārthaḥ, tarhyapratyakṣakāraṇatvaṃ nityatve hetuḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3102: tantvādyavayavānāṃ vibhāgānnāśādvā paṭhādināśo dṛṣṭaḥ, tacca dvayaṃ niravayavāṇūnāṃ nāstīti nityatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3104: avayavānāṃ saṃyogena dravyāntarotpattirāraṃbha iti yadi mataṃ syāt, tadā dravyavināśo dvābhyāmevetiniyamaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3106: ataḥ kāraṇameva svato nirviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavadavasthātmanā kāryamityanubhavabalādāstheyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3107: tathā cāṇūnāmapyavidyāpariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ pralayanimittena kālādinā piṇḍātmakasvarūpatirobhāvena kāraṇabhāvāpattirvināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3111: vastutastu ghṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ dravamityanusyūtaghṛtapariṇāmaviśeṣo dravyameva kāṭhinyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3112: naca dravyatve 'pyavayavavibhāgādeva tasya nāśa iti vācyaṃ, ghṛtasya pariṇāmina ekatvena vibhāgāsaṃbhavāt, paramāṇukāṭhinyanāśe tadasaṃbhavācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3113: kiñca pralaye nāsīdrajo nānyat kiñcanetyaṇūnāṃ nāśasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3118: gandharasarūpasparśaguṇā sthūlā pṛthivī, rūparasasparśaguṇāḥ sūkṣmā āpaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3119: rūpasparśaguṇaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ tejaḥ, sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni
GSP33brssgo2u:3124: nacāntareṇāpi mūrtyupacayaṃ guṇopacayo bhavatītyucyate, kāryeṣu bhūteṣu guṇopacaye mūrtyupacayadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3125: akalpyamāne tūpacitāpacitaguṇatve paramāṇutvasāmyaprasiddhaye yadi tāvatsarvaṃ ekaikaguṇā eva kalpyeraṃstatastejasi sparśasyopalabdhirna
GSP33brssgo2u:3126: syāt, apsu rūpasparśayoḥ, pṛthivyāṃ ca rasarūpasparśānāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3128: atha sarve caturguṇā eva kalpyetan, tato 'psvapi gandhasyopalabdhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3134: pārthivaḥ paramāṇūradhikaguṇastata ekaikanyūnaguṇā jalādiparamāṇava iti kalpyate, na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3140: neti pakṣe sarveṣāmāṇūnāṃ sāmyārthamekaikaguṇavattvaṃ vā syāccaturguṇavatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3146: ayaṃ tu paramāṇukāraṇavādo na kaiścidapi śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśena parigṛhīta ityatyantamevānādaraṇīyo vedavādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3151: yathā hi loke śaśakuśapalāśaprabhṛtīnāmatyantabhinnānāṃ satāṃ netaretarādhīnatvaṃ bhavati, evaṃ dravyādīnāmatyantabhinnatvānnaiva dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3152: atha bhavati dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ tato dravyabhāve bhāvāddravyābhāve
GSP33brssgo2u:3159: iha tu śuklaḥ kambalo rohiṇī dhenurnīlamutpalamiti dravyasyaiva tasya tasya tena tena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānatvānnaiva dravyaguṇayoragnidhūmayoriva bhedapratītirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3168: paṭasya tu guṇāḥ śuklatvādayaḥ paṭadeśā abhyupagamyante na tantudeśāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3172: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti
GSP33brssgo2u:3177: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ, prāksiddhasya kāryātkāraṇasyāyutasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3178: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti, evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya
GSP33brssgo2u:3180: siddhaṃ bhūtvā saṃbadhyata iti cet, prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3182_0: yathā cetpannamātrasyākriyasya kāryadravyasya vibhubhirākāśādibhirdravyāntaraiḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya
GSP33brssgo2u:3182_1: evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3186_0: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati, manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo
GSP33brssgo2u:3186_1: vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti, yathā caikāpi satī
GSP33brssgo2u:3192: tathāṇvātmamanasāmapradeśatvānna saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati, pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3196: iyānevāvidyamāno viruddho 'viruddho vārthaḥ kalpanīyo nāto 'dhika iti niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3198: naca vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyo 'nye 'dhikāḥ śataṃ sahasraṃ vārthā na kalpayitavyā iti nivārako heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3200: kaścitkṛpāluḥ prāṇināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ saṃsāra eva mābhūditi kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3201: anyo vā vyasanī muktānāmapi punarutpattiṃ kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3204: dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ niravayavābhyāṃ sāvayavasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3206: kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśritāśrayabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3213: paramāṇūnāṃ paricchinnatvādyāvatyo diśaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau daśa vā tāvadbhiravayavaiḥ sāvayavāste syuḥ sāvayavatvādanityāśceti nityatvaniravayavatvābhyupagamo bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3214: yāṃstvaṃ digbhedabhedino 'vayavānkalpayasi ta eva paramāṇava iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3217: yathā pṛthivī dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sthūlatamā vastubhūtāpi vinaśyati, tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ ca pṛthivyekajātīyakaṃ vinaśyati, tato dvyaṇukaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3222: yathā hi ghṛtasuvarṇādīnāmavibhajyamānāvayavānāmapyagnisaṃyogāddravabhāvāpattyā kāṭhanyavināśo bhavati, evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi paramakāraṇabhāvāpattyā
GSP33brssgo2u:3239: nityamekamanekasamavetaṃ sāmānyam, nityadravyavṛttayo viśeṣāḥ, nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti bhinnāni lakṣaṇāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:3246: guṇādiṣu tadadhīnatvaṃ tāvadanvayavyatirekasiddhaṃ, tathā ca guṇādayo
GSP33brssgo2u:3247: dravyābhinnāḥ, dravyādhīnatvāt, yadyasmādbhinnaṃ tanna tadadhīnaṃ, yathā śaśabhinnaḥ kuśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3248: abhede dravyaṃ guṇa iti śabdapratyayabhedaḥ kathaṃ, tatrāha-dravyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3251: astu guṇādīnāṃ dravyatādātmyamiti vadantaṃ tārkikamanyaṃ pratyāha-tathā
GSP33brssgo2u:3255: yadyapi tadadhīnatvaṃ taddharmatvaṃ, tacca dhūme nāsti, agniṃ vināpi bhāvāt, tathāpi tatkāryatvaṃ tadadhīnatvaṃ matvā vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3257: tathāpi tādātmyena pratīyamānatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3262: śauklyasya paṭaniṣṭhatvāt paṭasya tantudeśatvāt paṭaśauklyayorapṛthagdeśatvābhāvācchuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syādityādyaṃ dūṣayati-apṛthagdeśatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3267: evaṃ ṣaṭpadārthā atyantabhinnā iti siddhānto 'nubhavavirodhena dūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3273: 'siddhasya siddhasya veti vikalpyādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-siddhaṃ bhūtveti
GSP33brssgo2u:3274: satoraprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagamāttantupaṭayorapi saṃyogāpattirityapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3280: kalpitabhedasādhane siddhasādhanatā, vastubhedasādhane tu vyabhicāra iti
GSP33brssgo2u:3283: svarūpeṇaiva manuṣyādiśabdabhāgeva putrādyapekṣayā pitetyādivilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyo bhavati, naca bhidyata iti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3285: vilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyatvādityupalabdhighaṭitena-lakṣaṇena siṅgena prāptasya vastvantarasya saṃyogādeḥ saṃbandhivyatirekeṇānupalabdherabhāvo niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3288: saṃbandhasya saṃbandhyabhede saṃbandhinaḥ sadā sattvātsarvadā saṃbandhabuddhiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāṃ niṣedhati-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3289: parāpekṣayā nairantaryāvasthāyāmaṅgulyoḥ rūparūpiṇośca saṃbandhidhīḥ na svata ityuktamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3307: nanu dvyaṇukasyāsamavetatve tadāśritatvaṃ na syāt, saṃbandhaṃ vinā tadayogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3317_0: nanuparamāṇvapekṣayā yo 'yaṃ prācī dakṣiṇetyādidigbhedavyavahārastadavadhitvena ye 'vayavāstvayocyante ta eva mama paramāṇavaste
GSP33brssgo2u:3317_1: 'pi sāvayavāścet tadavayavā eveti evaṃ yataḥ paraṃ na vibhāgaḥ sa eva niravayavaḥ paramāṇuriti śaṅkati-yāṃstvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3320: ayamarthaḥ-yatsavātmanāvibhāgāyogyaṃ vastu sa paramāṇuriti yadyucyeta tarhi brahmaṇa eva paramāṇusaṃjñā kṛtā syāt, tadanyasyālpasya digvibhāgārhatvenāvayavavibhāgāvaśyaṃ bhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3321: yadi pṛthivyādijātīyo 'lpaparimāṇaviśrāntibhūmiryaḥ sa paramāṇurityucyeta tarhi tasya na mūlakāraṇatvaṃ, vināśitvāt, ghaṭavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:3322: naca hetvasiddhiḥ, aṇavo vināśinaḥ, pṛthivyādijātīyatvāt, ghaṭavaditi sādhanāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3323: saṃprati niravayavadravyasya nāśahetvabhāvādātmavadavināśa ityāśaṅkya pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati-vinaśyanta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3325: nimittādṛṣṭādināśādvināśaḥ pralaye saṃbhavati, muktau jñānādajñānanāśe tatkāryāṇunāśasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3329: kāryadravyasthitāvapi hetvātsaṃyogasya kṣīrāraṃbhakasaṃyogāddadhyārambhakaṃ na saṃyogāntaraṃ, tathā ca dadhyādau vyabhicārānna vyāptirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3330: kiñca yatkāryadravyaṃ taddravyārambhamityeva vyāptirastu lāghavāt, na tu saṃyogasacivasvanyūnaparimāṇenekadravyārambhamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3337: naca ta eva truṭināmāno jagaddhateva iti vācyam, pṛthivītvādinā sāvayavatvānityatvayoranumānāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3354: tatra te sarvāstitvavādino bāhyamāntaraṃ ca vastvabhyupagacchanti bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca cittaṃ caittaṃ ca, tāṃstāvatpratibrūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3357: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivyādiparamāṇavaḥ svarasnehoṣṇasvabhāvāste pṛthivyādibhāvena saṃhanyanta iti manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3360_0: tatredamabhidhīyate- yo 'yamubhayahetuka ubhayaprakāraḥ samudāyaḥ pareṣāmabhipreto 'ṇuhetukaśca bhūtabhautikasaṃhatirūpaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3366: anyasya ca kasyaciccetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsiturvā sthirasya saṃhanturanabhyupagamāt nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ca pravṛttyanuparamaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3371: FN: bhūte bhautikaṃ bāhyam, cittaṃ caittaṃ ca kāmādyantaramiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3373: svarāḥ kaṭhināḥ pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, snigdhā āpyāḥ, uṣṇastaijasāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3376: vijñānaskandhaḥ, sukhādyanubhavo vedāntaskandhaḥ, gauraśva ityevaṃnāmaviśiṣṭasavikalpapratyayaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ, rāgadveṣamohadharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3379: parimāṇabhedena dehāderāśutaravināśāṅgīkārādardhavaināśiko vaiśeṣikastasya nirāsānantaraṃ sarvakṣaṇikavādī buddhistho nirasyata iti
GSP33brssgo2u:3381: 'nābhāva upalabdheḥ'iti nirasanīyasiddhāntādatra nirasyasiddhāntasya bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tatsiddhāntaṃ vibhajate-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3386: sautrāntiko vaibhāṣiko yogācārī mādhyamikaśceti catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3389: bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ bāhyaṃ, cittaṃ caittaṃ ca kāmādyāntaramiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3390: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo vāyaṃ siddhānta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3391: tatra pramāṇamūla iti pūrvapakṣayan siddhāntaṃ tadīyaṃ darśayati-tatra
GSP33brssgo2u:3393: sthiraḥ prapañco brahmahetuka iti vedāntasiddhāntasya mānamūlakṣaṇikasiddhāntavirodhādasiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣe phalaṃ, siddhānte tadavirodha iti jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3394: pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ viṣayendriyātmakaṃ bhautikaṃ ca paramāṇusamudāya eva nāvayavyantaramiti matvā paramāṇūn
GSP33brssgo2u:3397: kharaḥ kaṭhinastatsvabhāvāḥ pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, snigdhā āpyāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3402: vijñānaskandhaḥ, sukhādyanubhavo vedanāskandhaḥ, gauraśva ityevaṃ nāmaviśiṣṭasavikalpakapratyayaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3408: yathā vidyuditi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti mānamūlo 'yaṃ siddhānta iti prāpte
GSP33brssgo2u:3410: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3412: nāpi cittākhyamabhijvalanaṃ vijñānaṃ samudāyahetuḥ, saṃghāte dehākāre jāte vijñānaṃ vijñāne jāte saṃghāta ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3413: naca kṣaṇikavijñānādanyaḥ kaścijjīva īśvaro vā tvayābhyupagamyate yaḥ saṃghātakartā bhavet
GSP33brssgo2u:3414: naca kartāramanapekṣyāṇavaḥ skandhāśca svayameva saṃghātārthaṃ pravartanta iti vācyam, anirmokṣaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3416: āśerate 'smin rāgādaya ityāśayaḥ saṃtānaḥ, sa kiṃ saṃtānibhyo 'nyo
GSP33brssgo2u:3421: kṣaṇikasya janmātiriktavyāpāro nāsti, tasmāttasya paramāṇvādimelanārthaṃ pravṛttiranupapannā
GSP33brssgo2u:3423: etenānanyaḥ saṃtāna iti pakṣo nirastaḥ, kṣaṇikasya melakatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3428: yadyapi bhoktā praśāsitā vā kaściccetanaḥ saṃhantā sthiro nābhyupagamyate tathāpyavidyādīnāmitaretarakāraṇatvādupapadyate lokayātrā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3430: te cāvidyādayo 'vidyā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāma rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśā
GSP33brssgo2u:3431: vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarā maraṇaṃ śokaḥ paridevanā duḥkhaṃ durmanastetyevañjātīyakā itaretarahetukāḥ saugate samaye kvacitsaṃkṣiptā nirdiṣṭāḥ kvacitprapañcitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3433: tadevamavidyādikalāpe parasparanimittanaimittikabhāvena ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamāner'thākṣipta upapannaḥ saṃghāta iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3443: saṃghātamantareṇātmānamalabhamānā apekṣante saṃghātamiti, tatastasya saṃghātasya nimittaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3444: tacca nityeṣvapyaṇuṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣvāśrayāśrayibhūteṣu ca bhokteṣu satsu na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /
GSP33brssgo2u:3445: kimaṅga punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣvapyaṇuṣu bhoktṛrahiteṣvāśrayiśūnyeṣu vābhyupagamyamāneṣu saṃbhavet
GSP33brssgo2u:3446: athāyamabhiprāyo 'vidyādaya eva saṃghātasya nimittamiti, kathaṃ tamevāśrityātmānaṃ labhamānāstasyaiva nimittaṃ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3447: atha manyase saṃghātā evānādau saṃsāre saṃtatyānuvartante tadāśrayāścāvidyādaya iti, tadapi
GSP33brssgo2u:3448: niyamena vā sadṛśamevotpadyeta, aniyamena vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ votpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3450: aniyamābhyupagame 'pi manuṣyapudgalaḥ kadācitkṣaṇena hastī bhūtvā devo vā
GSP33brssgo2u:3453: apica yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syātsa nāsti sthiro bhokteti tavābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3454: tataśca bhogo bhogārtha eva sa nānyena prārthanīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3455: tathā mokṣo mokṣārthaṃ eveti mumukṣuṇā nānyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3458: tasmāditaretarotpattimātranimittatvamavidyādīnāṃ yadi bhavedbhavatu nāma natu saṃghātaḥ siddhyet
GSP33brssgo2u:3460: FN: kāryaṃ prati ayate gacchatīti pratyayaḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3461: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tatṣaḍāyatanam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3469: kṣaṇikeṣu sthiratvabuddhiravidyā, tato rāgadveṣamohāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3470: tebhyo garbhasthasyādyaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, tasmāccālayavijñānāt pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ nāmāśrayatvānnāma bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3473_0: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ, nāmarūpendriyāṇāṃ mithaḥ saṃyogaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3473_1: sparśaḥ, tataḥ sukhādikā vedanā, tayā punarviṣayatṛṣṇā, tayā pravṛttirūpādānaṃ, tena bhavatyasmājjanmeti bhavo dharmādiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3474: jātānāṃ skandhānāṃ paripāko jarāskandhaḥ, maraṇaṃ nāśaḥ, mriyamāṇasya putrādisnehādantardāhaḥ śokaḥ, tena hā putretyādivilāpaḥ paridevanā,
GSP33brssgo2u:3475: aniṣṭānubhavo duḥkhaṃ, tenaṃ durmanastā mānasī vyathā, itiśabdo mānāpamānādikleśasaṃgrahārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3478: avidyādihetukā janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvādarthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:3480: avidyādīnāmuttarottarahetutvamaṅgīkṛtya saṃghātahetvabhāvāt saṃghāto na syādityukte pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3481: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ, tannāstītyāha-atrocyate, yadīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3484_0: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa saṃhatikartṛtvāyogātsaṃghātāpatternimittaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3484_1: nāstītyuktaṃ tadā kṣaṇikapakṣe tannāstīti kimu vaktavyamityāha-kimiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3489: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na
GSP33brssgo2u:3490: saṃhantāramapekṣate, pūrvasaṃghātāśrayā avidyādaya uttarasaṃghātapravartakā iti nānyonyāśrayadoṣo
GSP33brssgo2u:3496: yo yadicchati sa tatkāle nāsti cedicchāvyarthā, asti cet kṣaṇikatvabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3503: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādino 'yamabhyupagama uttarasminkṣaṇa utpadyamāne pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo nirudhyata iti
GSP33brssgo2u:3506: atha bhāvabhūtaḥ pariniṣpannāvasthaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇasya heturityabhiprāyastathāpi nopapadyate
GSP33brssgo2u:3508: atha bhāva evāsya vyāpāra ityabhiprāyastathāpi naivopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3510: svabhāvoparāgābhyupagame ca hetusvabhāvasya phalakālāvasthāyitve sati kṣaṇabhaṅgābhyupagamatyāgaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3511: vinaiva vā svabhāvoparāgeṇa hetu phalabhāvamabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatra tatprāpteratiprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3512: apicotpādanirodhau nāma vastunaḥ svarūpameva vā syātāmavasthāntaraṃ vā vastvantarameva vā
GSP33brssgo2u:3514: yadi tāvadvastunaḥ svarūpamevotpādanirodhau syātāṃ tato vastuśabda utpādanirodhaśabdau ca paryāyāḥ prāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3515: asthāsti kaścidviśeṣa iti manyetotpādanirodhaśabdābhyāṃ madhyavartino vastuna ādyantākhye avasthe abhilapyete iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3517: athātyantavyatiriktāvevotpādanirodhau vastunaḥ syātāmaśvamahiṣavat, tato vastu utpādanirodhābhyāmasaṃsṛṣṭamiti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3518: yadi ca darśanādarśane vastuna utpādanirodhau syātām, evamapi draṣṭṛdharmau tau na vastudharmāviti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3522: dvividho hi kāryasamutpādaḥ sugatasaṃmato hetvadhīnaḥ kāraṇasamudāyādhīnaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3529: nanu kāryakāle vināśavyāptatve 'pi pūrvakṣaṇe sattvāt kṣaṇikārthasya
GSP33brssgo2u:3532: kiṃ hetorutpattyatiriktaḥ kāryotpādanākhyo vyāpāraḥ, anatirikto vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3535: uktaṃ hi 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyata'iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3536: yeṣāṃ kṣaṇikābhāvānāṃ yā bhūtiḥ saiva kriyā kārakaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3537: naṣṭasyāpi nimittattvaṃ syānvopādānatvaṃ, tathā ca mṛdāderghaṭādikālāsattve ghaṭādyanutpattiḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3552: athāsatyeva hetau phalotpattiṃ brūyāt, tataḥ pratijñoparodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3553: caturvidhānhetūnpratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3555: athottarakṣaṇotpattiryāvattāvadavatiṣṭhate pūrvakṣaṇa iti brūyāttato yaugapadyaṃ hetuphalayoḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3561: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3566: sahetukatvapakṣe 'nvayikāraṇasya mṛdādeḥ kāryasahabhāvāpattyā kṣaṇikatvapratijñāhāniriti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-athottarakṣaṇetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3572: apica vaināśikāḥ kalpayanti buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3574: trayamapi caitadavastvabhāvamātraṃ nirupākhyamiti manyante, buddhipūrvakaḥ kila vināśo bhāvānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāma bhāṣyate, tadviparīto
GSP33brssgo2u:3582: etau hi pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau saṃtānagocarau vā syātāṃ bhāvagocarau vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3586: nahi bhāvānāṃ niranvayo nirupākhyo vināśaḥ saṃbhavati, sarvāsvapyavasthāsu pratyabhijñānabalenānvayyavicchedadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3590: pratīpā pratukūlaḥ saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3598: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3603: saṃtāno nāma bhāvānāṃ hetuphalabhāvena pravāhaḥ, tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3605: dvitīye caramasyāsattvaprasaṃgaḥ, arthakriyākāritvaṃ sattvamiti svasiddhāntāt, caramasyāsattve
GSP33brssgo2u:3619: yo 'yamavidyādinirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhāntaḥpātī paraparikalpitaḥ, sa samyagjñānādvā saparikarātsyātsvayameva vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3631: yacca teṣāmevābhipretaṃ nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca nirupākhyamiti, tatra nirodhadvayasya nirupākhyatvaṃ purastānnirākṛtam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3635: āgamaprāmāṇyāttāvat 'ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) ityādiśrutibhya ākāśasya ca vastutvaprāptiḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3636: vipratipannānprati tu śabdaguṇānumeyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ, gandhādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ pṛthivyādivastvāśrayatvadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3639: yenāvaraṇabhāvo viśeṣyate tattarhi vastubhūtamevākāśaṃ manyamānasya saugatasya svābhyupagamavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3645: apica nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca trayamapyetannirūpākhyamavastu nityaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:3650: kiṃ samyak niścaya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃ saṃniścayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3653: nanvāgamaprāmāṇye vipratipannānsugatānpratyākāśasya vastutvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-vipratipannāniti
GSP33brssgo2u:3654: śabdo vastuniṣṭhaḥ guṇatvāt, gandhādivadityanumānādākāśasya vastutvaṃ sidhyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3664: kiṃ samyak niśraya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃsaṃniśrayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3672: apica vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatāmabhyupayannupalabdhurapi kṣaṇikatāmabhyupeyāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3679: apica darśanasmaraṇayoḥ kartaryekasminpratyakṣaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sarvasya lokasya prasiddho 'hamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3680: yadi hi tayorbhinnaḥ kartā syāttato 'haṃ smārāmyadrākṣīdanya iti pratīyāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3682: yatraivaṃ pratyayastatra darśanasmaraṇayorbhinnameva kartāraṃ sarvaloko 'vagacchati, smarāmyahamasāvado 'drākṣīditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3685: na nāhamityātmano darśanaṃ nirvṛttaṃ nihnute yathāgniranuṣṇo 'prakāśa iti vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3686: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3687_0: tathānantaramanantarāmātmana eva pratipattiṃ pratyabhijānannekakartṛkāmottamāducchvāsādatītāśca pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3687_1: pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko nāpapeta sa yadi brūyātsādṛśyādetatsamapatsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3697: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3699: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena na buddhisaṃtānamārohati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3704: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3705: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti
GSP33brssgo2u:3706: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3710: kṣaṇikatve jñānadvayānusaṃdhānaṃ ca na syādityāha-kathaṃ hyahamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3713: yo 'hamadaḥ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya tatsmarāmīti pratyabhijñānākāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3717: draṣṭṛsmartrorbhede 'haṃ smarāmi anyo 'drākṣīditi pratītiḥ syādityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yatraivamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:3719: smarāmyahamanyo 'drākṣīditi pratyayo yatra tatra bhinnameva kartāraṃ loko 'vagacchatītyavivādamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3720: prakṛtapratyabhijñāyāṃ tādṛśabhedapratyayasya bādhakasyādarśanādātmasthāyitvaṃ durvāramityāha-iha tvahamada iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3721: yathāgnerauṣṇyādikaṃ na bādhate kaścittathā nāhamadrākṣamiti pūrvadarśanaṃ na nihnuta ityanena bādhābhāvāt pratyabhijñā prametyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3728: sādṛśyajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānādhīnatvāt sthirasya jñāturasattvānna sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavati, sattve vāpasiddhāntaḥ syāditi
GSP33brssgo2u:3732: kiṃ tarhi kaścideṣa vikalpaḥ svākārameva bāhyatvena viṣayīkurvāṇaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3734: atra vaktavyaṃ sādṛśyapratyaye tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vastutrayaṃ bhāsate na veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3739: atha bhāsate vastutrayaṃ tacca pratyayābhinnameva na bāhyamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3743_0: vastutrayaṃ jñeyaṃ sādṛśyapratyayādbhinnaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ taccennāṅgīkriyate sthāyidraṣṭṛprasaṅgabhayena, tarhi tattadākārāṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3745: tathā ca tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti bāhyārthayorjñānapūrvakaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jānata ātmanaḥ sthāyitvaṃ durvāramityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3752_0: na cedānīṃ ghaṭa iti pratyakṣamavartamānakālāsattvaṃ ghaṭasya gocarayadvartamānakṣaṇamātrasatvarūpe kṣaṇikatve mānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3753: naca yatsat tatkṣaṇikamiti vyāptirasti, vidyudāderapi dvitrikṣaṇasthāyitvena dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3756: kiñca sādṛśyaṃ pratyabhijñāyāṃ doṣayatā nimittaṃ viṣayatayā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3771: itaścānupapanno vaināśikasamayaḥ, yataḥ sthiramanuyāyikāraṇamanabhyupagacchatāmabhāvādbhāvotpattirityetadāpadyate darśayanti cābhāvādbhāvotpattim- 'nānupamṛdya prādurbhāvāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3772: vinaṣṭāddhi kila bījādaṅ kura utpadyate, tathā vinaṣṭātkṣīrāddadhi,
GSP33brssgo2u:3781: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti, yena bījādevāṅ kuro
GSP33brssgo2u:3786: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3790: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3796: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3799_0: apica caturbhiścittacaittā utpadyante, paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3800: abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantāsannityaṅgīkṛtya mṛdādināśādasato ghaṭādikaṃ jāyate iti sugatā vadanti, taddūṣayati-nāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3801: na kevalaṃ balādāpadyate kintu svayaṃ darśayanti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:3807: nityasya niratiśayasya kāryaśaktatve tatkāryāṇi sarvāṇyekasminneva kṣaṇe
GSP33brssgo2u:3815: yadi bījābhāvasyābhāvāntarādviśeṣaḥ syāt, tadā viśeṣavadabhāvadvārā bījādevāṅkura iti laukāyatikānāmabhyupagamor'thavānsyāt, na so 'stītyāha-yeneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3822: abhāvo na prakṛtiḥ, kāryānanvitatvāt, yathā śarāvādyananvitastanturna śarāvādiprakṛtiriti tarkapūrvakamāha-abhāvācceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3826: naca śaktasya sahakāryapekṣā na yukteti vācyaṃ, yato 'śaktasyāpi
GSP33brssgo2u:3830: na cātiśayasyātiśayāntarānapekṣatve kāryasyāpyanapekṣeti vācyaṃ, paṭasya mṛdanapekṣatve kāryatvāviśeṣādghaṭasyāpi
GSP33brssgo2u:3835: na hyarthakriyākāritvameva sattvam, asatastadayogena sattvasya tato
GSP33brssgo2u:3859: tasmādbhrāntimūlena kṣaṇikabāhyārthavādena kūṭasthanityabrahmasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham //27//
GSP33brssgo2u:3865: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
GSP33brssgo2u:3866: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā
GSP33brssgo2u:3869: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate
GSP33brssgo2u:3871: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto
GSP33brssgo2u:3874: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3880: prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti, nāsau jñānagataviśeṣamantareṇopapadyata
GSP33brssgo2u:3888: yathāhi svapnamāyāmarīcyudakagandharvanagarādipratyayā vinaiva bāhyenārthena grāhyagrāhakākārā bhavanti, evaṃ jāgaritagocarā api
GSP33brssgo2u:3893: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3902: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3904_0: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti, tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa
GSP33brssgo2u:3904_1: svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti
GSP33brssgo2u:3906: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3911: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3912: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3915: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3917: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī /
GSP33brssgo2u:3919: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3920: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3921: naca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyādviṣayanāśo bhavati, asati viṣaye viṣayasārūpyānupapatteḥ, bahirupalabdheśca viṣayasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3922: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam
GSP33brssgo2u:3923: apica ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti viśeṣaṇayoreva ghaṭapaṭayorbhedo na viśeṣyasya jñānasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3924: dvābhyāṃ ca bheda etasya siddho bhavatyekasmācca dvayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3927: atrāpi hi viśeṣyayoreva darśanasmaraṇayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇas ghaṭasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3928: yathā kṣīragandhaḥ kṣīrarasa iti viśeṣyayoreva gandharasayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:3932: vijñānaṃ vijñānamityabhyupagacchatā bāhyorthaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyamityevañjātīyakaḥ tasmānnābhyupagamyata eveti yuktamabhyupagantum /
GSP33brssgo2u:3936: aviruddhaṃ tu lokaprasiddhaṃ svātmavyatiriktena vijñānena bāhyor'thonubhūyata iti necchāsyaho pāṇḍityaṃ mahaddarśitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3938: nanu vijñānasya svarūpavyatiriktagrāhyatve tadapyanena grāhyaṃ tadapyanyenetyanavasthā prāpnoti
GSP33brssgo2u:3939: apica pradīpavadavabhāsātmakatvājjñānasya jñānāntaraṃ kalpayataḥ samatvādavabhāsyāvabhāsakabhāvānupapatteḥ kalpanānarthakyamiti /
