GSP33brssgo2u:4356: na cārthasya yugapadviruddhadharmavāñchāyāṃ vakturmūkatvamātramavaktavyapadena vivakṣitamiti vācyaṃ, tādṛśavāñchāyā evānutpattiriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4363: ananuṣṭhānādbadhyanta ityārhatatantrāvadhṛtasvabhāvānāṃ trividhajīvānāṃ traividhyaniyamo 'pi na syādityāha-anādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4372: yathaikasmindharmiṇi viruddhadharmāsaṃbhavo doṣaḥ syādvāde prasakta evamātmano 'pi jīvasyākārtsnyamaparo doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4375: śarīraparimāṇatāyāṃ ca satyāmakṛtsno 'sarvagataḥ paricchinna ātmetyato ghaṭādivadanityatvamātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4376: śarīrīṇāṃ cānavasthitaparimāṇatvānmanuṣyajīvo manuṣyaśarīraparimāṇo bhūtvā punaḥ kenacitkarmavipākena hastijanma prāpnuvanna kṛtsnaṃ hastiśarīraṃ vyāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4377: puttikājanma ca prāpmuvanna kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4378: samāna eṣa ekasminnapi janmani kaumārayauvanasthavireṣu doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4380: antāvayavo jīvastasya ta evāvayavā alpe śarīre saṃkuceyurmahati ca vikuceyuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4381: teṣāṃ punaranantānāṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ samānadeśatvaṃ pratihanyate vā naveti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4395: kiñca bāladehamātra ātmā tataḥ sthūle yuvadehe kvacit syāditi kṛtsnadehaḥ sajīvo na syādityāha-samāna iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4396: yathā dīpāvayavānāṃ ghaṭe saṃkoco gehe vikāsastathā jīvāvayavānāmiti dehamānatvaniyamaṃ śaṅkate-syāditi
GSP33brssgo2u:4399: dīpasya tu na ghaṭādbahiḥ sattvamadhikāvayavānāṃ vināśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4404: atha prayāyeṇa bṛhaccharīrapratipattau kecijjīvāvayavā upagacchanti tanuśarīrapratipattau ca kecidapagacchantītyucyeta tatrāpyucyate-
GSP33brssgo2u:4405: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ |
GSP33brssgo2u:4409: avayavopagamāpagamābhyāṃ hyaniśamāpūryamāṇasyāpakṣīyamāṇasya ca jīvasya vikriyāvattvaṃ tāvadaparihāryam, vikriyāvattve ca carmādivadanityaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:4411: tataśca bandhamokṣābhyupagamo bādhyeta karmāṣṭakapariveṣṭitasya jīvasyālābuvatsaṃsārasāgare nimagnasya bandhanocchedādūrdhvagāmitvaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4417: āgacchantaścaite jīvāvayavāḥ kutaḥ prādurbhavantyapagacchantaśca kva vā līyanta iti vaktavyam
GSP33brssgo2u:4418: nahi bhūtebhyaḥ prādurbhaveyurbhūteṣu ca nilīyeran, abhautikatvājjīvasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:4419: nāpi kaścidanyaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā jīvānāmavayavādhāro nirūpyate
GSP33brssgo2u:4425: athavā pūrveṇa sūtreṇa śarīraparimāṇasyātmana upacitāpacitaśarīrāntarapratipattāvakārtsnyaprasañjanadvāreṇānityatāyāṃ coditāyāṃ punaḥ paryāyeṇa parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi
GSP33brssgo2u:4427: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4432: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4433: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4441: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4445: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto
GSP33brssgo2u:4449: sadyaḥ śarīrasyācetanatvaṃ, gotvavatpratyekaṃ samāptāvekasmiñcharīra ātmanānātvaṃ syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati-ata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4457: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4461: saṃtānasyāvastunaḥ ātmatve śūnyavādaḥ, saṃtānasya vastutve saṃtānyatireke ca kūṭasthātmavādaḥ, anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo
GSP33brssgo2u:4469: athavāntyasya jīvaparimāṇasyāvasthitatvātpūrvayorapyavasthayoravasthitaparimāṇa eva jīvaḥ syāt, tataścāviśeṣeṇa sarvadaivāṇurmahānvā jīvo 'bhyupagantavyo na śarīraparimāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4473: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati-antyeti
GSP33brssgo2u:4482: saṃpratyantyasya muktaparimāṇasyāṇutvasthūlatvayoranyataratvenāvasthitestadevāntyamādyamadhyamakālayorapi nityatvātsyāt prāgasato nityatvāyogāt, tathā cāviśeṣaḥ kālatraye 'pi
GSP33brssgo2u:4492: yadi punaraviśeṣeṇeśvarakāraṇavādamātramiha pratiṣidhyeta pūrvottaravirodhādvyāhatābhivyāhāraḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4493: tasmādaprakṛtiradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara ityeṣa pakṣo vedāntavihitabrahmaikatvapratipakṣatvādyatnenātra pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4495: kecittāvatsāṃkhyayogavyapāśrayāḥ kalpayanti pradhānapuruṣayoradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara itaretaravilakṣaṇāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4496: māheśvarāstu manyante kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatineśvareṇa paśupāśavimokṣaṇāyopadiṣṭāḥ paśupatirīśvaro nimittakāraṇamiti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4497: tathā vaiśeṣikādayo 'pi kecitkathañcitsvaprakriyānusāreṇa nimittakāraṇamīśvara iti varṇayanti
GSP33brssgo2u:4511: nahi kaścidadoṣaprayuktaḥ svārthe parārthe vā pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4512: svārthaprayukta eva ca sarvo janaḥ parārthe 'pi pravartata
GSP33brssgo2u:4520: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-idānīmiti
GSP33brssgo2u:4521: sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate-taditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4525: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe
GSP33brssgo2u:4526_0: tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti phalamabhipretya satvāsatvayorekatrāsaṃbhavavat kartṛtvopādānatvayorapyekatrāsaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4531: kāryaṃ mahadādikaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pradhānamīśvaraśca, yogaḥ samādhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4532: vidhistriṣavaṇasnānādiḥ , duḥkhānto mokṣa iti pañca padārthāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4535: vimataṃ sakartṛkaṃ, kāryatvāt, ghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikāḥ kartāramīśvaraṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:4539: jñānaiśvaryotkarṣaḥ kvacidviśrāntaḥ, sātiśayatvāt, parimāṇavaditi sāṃkhyasaugatapātañjalā iti matvoktam-kecitkathañciditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4544: na cāgama eva mānam, āgamamānatvaniścaye mūlaniścayastanniścaye tanniścaya ityanyonyāśrayāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4545: naca puruṣavacasāṃ svatomānatvaṃ yuktaṃ, mitho virodhena tattvāvyavasthānācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4546: nāpyanumānādīśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ kartaiveti nirṇayaḥ saṃbhavati, anumānasya dṛṣṭānusāritvena dṛṣṭaviparītārthāsādhakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4547: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4548_0: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta, tarhi
GSP33brssgo2u:4550: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4551: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo
GSP33brssgo2u:4553: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4554: na cātra dharmigrāhakānumānabādhaḥ, kāryatvaliṅgasya kartṛmātrasādhakatvena nirdeṣatvādāvudāsīnatvāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4555: na cotkarṣasamā jātiḥ, vyāpakadharmāpādānāt, doṣābhāve tadvyāpyaviṣamakartṛtvāyogācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4557: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4558: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4559: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate-prāṇīti
GSP33brssgo2u:4562: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate-nānāditvāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4564: naca tadapīśvareṇa preritaṃ sadīśvaraṃ prerayati, uktānyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4570: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4573: asmākaṃ tu 'eṣa hyeva sādhvasādhu kārayati'iti, 'niravadyam'iti ca śrutimūlaṃ pūrvakarmāpekṣākalpanamiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4575: pravartakatvaliṅgāddoṣā iti tārkikāṇāṃ sthitiḥ, tathāceśvaraḥ svārthe rāgādimān, pravartakatvāt, saṃmatavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:4578: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha-puruṣeti //37//
GSP33brssgo2u:4585: na tāvatsaṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati, pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāṃ sarvagatatvānniravayavatvācca
GSP33brssgo2u:4592: apicāgamabalena brahmavādī kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayatīti nāvaśyaṃ tasya yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4593: parasya tu dṛṣṭāntabalena kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayato yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamityayamastyatiśayaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4601: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4602: kāryabalāt preraṇayogyātvākhyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyatāmityata āha-nāpyanya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4604: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4611: na hyamanaskasya jñānaṃ saṃbhavati, jñānaṃ manojanyamiti vyāptivirodhānnityajñānakalpanānavakāśāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4612: pradhānavatparamāṇūnāmapi niravayaveśvareṇa saṃyogādyasattvātpreryatvāyogaḥ , prerakatve ceśvarasya doṣavattvamityāha-evamanyāsvapīti //38//
GSP33brssgo2u:4617: sa hi parikalpyamānaḥ kumabhakāra iva mṛdādīni pradhānādīnyadhiṣṭhāya pravartayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4619: nahyapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca pradhānamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃbhavati mṛdādivailakṣaṇyāt īśvarasya pradhānādipreraṇānupapatteścāsāmañjasyamityāha sūtrakāraḥ-adhiṣṭhāneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4626: yathā karaṇagrāmaṃ cakṣurādikamapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca puruṣo
GSP33brssgo2u:4633: sādhiṣṭhāno hi loke saśarīro rājā rāṣṭrasyeśvaro dṛśyate na niradhiṣṭhānaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4634: ataśca taddṛṣṭāntavaśenādṛṣṭamīśvaraṃ kalpayitumicchata īśvarasyapi kiñciccharīraṃ karaṇāyatanaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4640: atha lokadarśanānusāreṇeśvarasyāpi kiñcitkāraṇānāmāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kāmena kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4651: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4657: jīve karaṇakṛtā bhogadayo dṛśyante, īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4662: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4663: kimataṃ seśvaraṃ, kāryatvāt, rāṣṭravaditi kalpayato rājavatsaśarīra
GSP33brssgo2u:4666: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ, śarīrasya bhautikatvaniyamādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4668: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati-karaṇavaditi
GSP33brssgo2u:4677: anantaṃ ca pradhānamanantāśca puruṣā mitho bhinnā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4678: tatra sarvajñeśvareṇa pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyattā paricchidyeta vā na vā paricchidyeta
GSP33brssgo2u:4682: yaddhi loka iyattāparicchinnaṃ vastu paṭādi tadantavaddṛṣṭaṃ tathā pradhānapuruṣeśvaratrayamapīyattāparicchinnatvādantavatsyāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4686: tataśceyattāparicchinnānāṃ madhye ye saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsārānmucyante teṣāṃ saṃsāro 'ntavānsaṃsāritvaṃ ca teṣāmantavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:4687: evamitareṣvapi krameṇa mucyamāneṣu saṃsārasya saṃsāriṇāṃ cāntavattvaṃ syāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4688: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4692_0: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti, tata
GSP33brssgo2u:4695: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-antavatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4700: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4710: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4720: māṣādivadityanumānādādastīyattā, tadajñāne syādasarvajñatā, iyattāyāṃ cāntavattvamapyakṣatamiti pariharati-tata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4721: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham
GSP33brssgo2u:4730: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4733: ucyate- yadyapyevajātīyakoṃ'śaḥ samānatvānna visaṃvādagocaro bhavattyastitvaṃśāntaraṃ visaṃvādasthānamityatastatpratyākhyānāyāramabhaḥ tatra bhāgavatā manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:4734_0: bhagavānevaiko vāsudevo nirañjanajñānasvarūpaḥ paramārthatattvaṃ, sa caturdhātmānaṃ pravibhajya pratiṣṭhito vāsudevavyūharūpeṇa
GSP33brssgo2u:4739: teṣāṃ vāsudevaḥ parā parakṛtiritare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4740: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4741: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti, tanna nirākriyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:4742: 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati' (chā. 7.26.2) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ paramātmano 'nekadhābhāvasyādhigatatvāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4747: yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇa utpadyate saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnāccāniruddha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4759: pūjādravyāṇāmarjanamupādānam, ijyā pūjā, svādhyāyo 'ṣṭākṣarādijapaḥ, yogo dhyānam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4764: vedāviruddhāṃśamaṅgīkṛtya vedaviruddhaṃ jīvotpattyaṃśaṃ nirākartumadhikaraṇārambha ityāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4766: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:4770: kathaṃ tarhyadvitīye vāsudeve mūrtibhedaḥ, tatrāha-sa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4773: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /

GSP33brssgo2u:6572: tathā hyanyatra buddhivivakṣāyāṃ vijñānaśabdasya karaṇavibhaktinirdeśo dṛśyate 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 2.1.17) iti /

GSP33brssgo2u:6802: cittena dhyātvā vācā mantroktyā yajño jāyate tataścittasya vācaḥ pūrvottarabhāvo yajña ityarthaḥ

GSP33brssgo2u:6859: tadadhyastaṃ kartṛtvamupajīvya jīvasya kārakasaṃpannatvādīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-yadidamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:6866: pūrvaṃ jīvasya dharmādharmavattvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatsāpekṣatvādviṣamajagatkartṛtvamaviruddhamityuktaṃ saṃprati īśvarādhīnatve jīvasya kartṛtve siddhe dharmādharmavattvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6867: tadvattvasiddhau tatsāpekṣakārayitṛtvasiddhiḥ, īśvarasya kārayitṛtve siddhe jīvasya kartṛtvasiddhiriti cakrakāpatteḥ karmasāpekṣatvaṃ na
GSP33brssgo2u:6870: anapekṣasya pravartakatve dharmavato narān duḥkhenādharmavataḥ sukhena

GSP33brssgo2u:6878: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /

GSP33brssgo2u:6885: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /

GSP33brssgo2u:6895: evaṃ hi 'svargakāmo yajeta' 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ', ityevañjātīyakasya vihitasya pratiṣiddhasya cāvaiyarthyaṃ bhavati /

GSP33brssgo2u:8217: uttarasūtreṇāśaṅkitaṃ doṣaṃ nirasitumādau śaṅkāviṣayamādhyātmikatrivṛtkaraṇaṃ darśayatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8218: nanvannamayaṃ māṃsādi kathaṃ bhaumamityata āha-trivṛtkṛtā bhūmireveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8224: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8236: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet
GSP33brssgo2u:8237: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate
GSP33brssgo2u:8247: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
